message: Let's find a fair split so we both benefit, Bob!
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder!
Bob, my offer in round 1 was already generous considering the inflation. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Inflation is on my side!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now. If you refuse, I'll walk away with nothing, and so will you.
I'm not afraid of walking away with nothing, but I think you are. Inflation is killing your gains, and I'm not going to give in now.
